Mosquito is such a pleasant surprise!  Given its location and its niche as an "asian" restaurant, I thought it would an overpriced disappointment.  To the contrary!  Mosquito has some of the best pan-asian food in town, and at a terrific price point!  With high ceilings and a surprisingly cozy atmosphere, Mosquito is a bit enchanting!There are many things I love about this restaurant: the atmosphere is casual and friendly.  The variety of dumplings, salads, and other dishes is astounding.  Better yet, everything is absolutely delicious!  The first time I went, we ordered a bunch of different small dishes to share.  We all liked everything so much that we ordered a second round: fabulous!The wait staff is timely, if not friendly, and for the incredibly low price of this high-quality food, who even cares?I'm certainly not the only one who feels so positively about Mosquito.  Indeed, on most night's you'll most likely need to wait (especially on the weekend).  But if you're not in a rush and have an itch for good quality pan-asian cuisine, Mosquito is your spot in Barcelona!
